title: De Corpore Politico; or, The Elements of Law, Moral and Politick
sourceDesc: [De Corpore Politico; or, The Elements of Law, Moral and Politick] was first published in 1650. Our copytext is the posthumous edition of 1652, because we are not aware of any reason doubt the quality of this edition, and a transcription of it is available at EEBO-TCP.
author: Thomas Hobbes
